alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clark; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 9:07PM CST until December 29 at 12:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Another Snow Event Expected Tuesday... .Snow will overtake most of the area Tuesday morning and last several hours before transitioning to a round of freezing drizzle later in the day. Several inches of snow are possible, especially in Wisconsin. Like Sunday night, roads are expected to quickly become snow covered on Tuesday causing less than perfect travel conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and freezing drizzle expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of western and central Wisconsin. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to midnight CST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511wi.gov.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clark; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe; Taylor
